channel.title: Supertest on QA Discovery
channel.description: Recent content in Supertest on QA Discovery

item.title: Supertest Tutorial: Advanced Usage - Integration CI CD and Github action
item.description: CI/CD integration Integration github action The mocha version integration github action The jest version integration github action CI/CD integration Integration github action Use github action as an example, and other CI tools similarly The mocha version integration github action See the demo at https://github.com/Automation-Test-Starter/SuperTest-Mocha-demo Create the .github/workflows directory: In your GitHub repository, create a directory called .github/workflows. This will be where the GitHub Actions workflow files will be stored.

item.title: Supertest 教程：进阶用法 - 集成 CI/CD 和 Github action
item.description: 持续集成 接入 github action Mocha 版本接入 github action Jest 版本接入 github action 持续集成 接入 github action 以 github action 为例，其他 CI 工具类似 Mocha 版本接入 github action 可参考 demo：https://gith

item.title: Supertest Tutorial: Building a Supertest API Automation Test project from 0 to 1
item.description: Build a SuperTest API automation test project from 0 to 1 Mocha version Create a new project folder Project Initialization Install dependencies Create new test folder and test cases Writing Test Cases Configuring mocha config files Updating test scripts for mocha Running test cases Test Report Terminal Test Report Integrated mochawesome test report Jest version Create a new jest project folder Jest demo project initialization Jest demo install dependencies Create new Jest demo project test folder and test cases Writing Jest demo Test Cases Configuring Jest config files Adapting Jest Test Scripts Runing test case Jest test report Jest terminal Test Report Integrating jest-html-reporters test reports Build a SuperTest API automation test project from 0 to 1 The following is a demo of building a SuperTest API automation test project from 0 to 1, using either Jest or Mocha as the test framework.

item.title: Supertest 教程：从 0 到 1 搭建 Supertest 接口自动化测试项目
item.description: 从 0 到 1 搭建 SuperTest 接口自动化测试项目 Mocha 版本 新建项目文件夹 项目初始化 安装依赖 新建测试文件及测试用例 编写测试用例 配置 mocha 配置文件 调整测试脚本 运行测试用

item.title: Supertest Tutorial: Getting Started and Setting Up Your Environment
item.description: Introduction Introduction of SuperTest Introduction of Jest Introduction of Mocha Introduction of CHAI Project dependencies Project Structure Next Introduction This project is a quick start tutorial for API automation testing using SuperTest, and will use Jest or Mocha as the testing framework for demo demonstration. We will introduce SuperTest, Jest and Mocha in turn, so that you can understand the basic usage of these tools in advance. Introduction of SuperTest “Supertest” is a popular JavaScript library for testing Node.

item.title: Supertest 教程：入门介绍和环境搭建准备
item.description: 介绍 SuperTest 介绍 Jest 介绍 Mocha 介绍 CHAI 简介 项目依赖 项目文件结构 Next 介绍 本项目是一个使用 SuperTest 进行 API 自动化测试的快速启动项目教程，会使用 Jest 或 Mocha 作为测试框架进行 demo 演
